AND ENTER_WITH ='출금완료' ORDER BY WITHDRAWAL_DATE DESC ) A ) B WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{firstRecord} AND #{lastRecord}

SELECT B.* FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT WITHDRAWAL.* , ( SELECT COUNT(WITHDRAWAL_NO) FROM WITHDRAWAL ) WITHDRAWL_COUNT FROM WITHDRAWAL INNER JOIN ENTER ON (WITHDRAWAL_ENTER = ENTER_TURN)

SELECT ORDERS.* , LPROD_ID, LPROD_GU, LPROD_NM , PROD.* , BUYER.* , ORDERS_APPLY.* FROM ORDERS_APPLY INNER JOIN LPROD ON (ORDER_APPLY_LGU = LPROD_GU) INNER JOIN PROD ON (ORDER_APPLY_ID = PROD_ID) INNER JOIN BUYER ON (ORDER_APPLY_BUYER = BUYER_ID) INNER JOIN ORDERS ON (ORDER_APPLY_TURN = ORDER_TURN) INNER JOIN ENTER ON (ORDER_APPLY_NO = ENTER_ORDER) WHERE ENTER_TURN = #{withdrawalNo}
